title: Content Creation Workflow
description: Streamlined workflow for content creators and marketers. Manage projects across multiple platforms, design graphics, and automate content distribution with integrated tools.
author: JSONbored
useCases: Creating social media graphics and assets

items.reason: Manage content projects, tasks, and deadlines in Asana
Alternative project management with powerful automation features
Create and edit visual content directly from Claude
Manage and optimize media assets for content distribution
Generate content briefs, documentation, and style guides

prerequisites: Cloudinary account (optional, for advanced media management)

troubleshooting.issue: Asana and ClickUp MCP servers conflict when both enabled
troubleshooting.solution: Choose one project management tool. Edit claude_desktop_config.json to comment out the unused server. Restart Claude Desktop to apply changes.

troubleshooting.issue: Canva MCP server fails with 'API key not found' error
troubleshooting.solution: Generate Canva API token at canva.com/developers. Add to config: CANVA_API_KEY=token. Verify token has design.read and design.write scopes.

troubleshooting.issue: Cloudinary media uploads fail after Canva integration
troubleshooting.solution: Set unique output directories for each service. Configure Canva uploads to /canva and Cloudinary to /cloudinary in respective MCP server settings.

troubleshooting.issue: Missing Node.js dependencies for all MCP servers in bundle
troubleshooting.solution: Install Node.js 18+ from nodejs.org. Run npm install -g @modelcontextprotocol/server-* for each MCP server. Verify with node --version.

troubleshooting.issue: Collection items installed but not appearing in Claude
troubleshooting.solution: Verify installation order: project management first, then media tools. Check claude_desktop_config.json syntax. Restart Claude Desktop completely.
